gameDetails.name: Carcassonne: King & Scout
gameDetails.description:
This bundle of two separate expansions contains 7 tiles for the original Carcassonne (King) and 5 tiles for Carcassonne: Hunters & Gatherers (Scout).

The 7 tiles from The King half of this expansion are also available in Carcassonne: Expansion 6 â€“ Count, King & Robber.

Part of the Carcassonne series.
